weaponEffects.title: Frost Resonance
weaponEffects.description: Increase frost ATK by **20%** and frost resistance by **40%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more frost weapons. This set effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot. Effect does not stack with Frost Reaction (Frost Resonance will take precendence).

weaponEffects.title: Elemental Mastery
weaponEffects.description: Increase final damage by **2.5%** for every element equipped. This effect works in the background.

abilities.name: Cold Eclipse
abilities.description: While on the ground, tap the attack button to attack up to 5 times.

abilities.name: Vanish
abilities.description: While in the air, attack 5 times, consuming stamina.

abilities.name: Stab
abilities.description: While on the ground, press and hold the attack button during a basic attack to trigger stab, dealing **570%** of ATK + **30** damage.

abilities.name: Steep
abilities.description: Press and hold the attack button in the air, climbing, or gliding to trigger steep. Deal **95%** of ATK + **5** damage per hit while falling and upon landing deal **570%** of ATK + **30** and knock down targets.

abilities.name: Dodge
abilities.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger a Phantasia, cooldown 15 seconds, reducing the speed of enemies within an area. Become immune to hitstun for **0.5** seconds while dodging.

abilities.name: Snow
abilities.description: Press the attack button while dodging and moving in a direction to trigger snow, dealing **269.2%** of ATK + **14** damage to nearby targets.

abilities.name: Number 9
abilities.description: Press the attack button while dodging to trigger number 9 for a short time, dealing **269.2%** of ATK + **14** damage to nearby targets.

abilities.name: Desolate Day
abilities.description:
Deals up to **1,950%** of ATK + **103** and spawns two yo-yos that move in fixed patterns, reducing the movement speed of targets in the skill's range by **50%** (does not affect bosses or players), cooldown **60** seconds.

The yo-yos pass through the center of the shape about 4 times per cycle (initial 4 seconds), dealing **100%** of ATK + **5** damage to targets that hit its, lasting **70** seconds. Using the skill again will refresh the position and duration of the yo-yos (cooldown **4** seconds).

While casting Desolate Day, receive **50%** less damage and recover **5%** of your max HP (not effected by healing boosts); these effects do not apply in Apex League.

abilities.name: Quiet
abilities.description:
Using Language of Ice grants up to **2** uses of Quiet, which can only be used during Desolate Day. Deal **1,300%** of ATK + **68** damage. While casting Quiet, receive **50%** less damage and recover **5%** of your max HP (not effected by healing boosts); these effects do not apply in Apex League.

When using Perseverance Resonance: Quiet will taunt nearby enemies and grant **1** shield, up to **3** stacks, lasting **20** seconds. The shield will block up to the sum of your **5 resistance stats**. When the shield is completely consumed or overflows, deal **block value * 200%** damage.

When using Benediction Resonance: Quiet deals **8%** of a target's max HP to targets with more than **95%** max HP (does not affect players). This damage is not affected by damage boosting and reducing effects.

abilities.name: Language of Ice
abilities.description: When ***weapon charge*** is full or ***Phantasia*** is triggered, switch to this weapon to **clear all debuffs from the user** and deal **1,662.5%** of ATK + **88** damage to nearby targets and **launch** them. During the discharge animation, become immune to damage for **2.6** seconds (does not take effect in Apex League).
